text: Ian from N-Code Consultants was an invaluable partner in our government grant application process. His deep understanding of grant requirements, combined with his technical knowledge and strategic approach, made navigating the complexities seamless. He was professional, proactive, and always ready to provide insights that strengthened our requirements. I highly recommend Ian to anyone seeking expert guidance on productivity expansion and grants.
Good to have work with them to digitalise some products. Consultative and cost effective. And bonus that they are a local company to support!

I had the privilege of working with Ian as our grant consultant and cannot express enough how instrumental he was in guiding our company through the government grant application for our tech project. His professionalism and vast knowledge ensured a seamless and successful process. If you're considering applying for grants, I'd highly recommend Ian for his expertise and support.

The solution you delivered has streamlined our operations and allowed us to optimize our productivity, translating to increased efficiency.

Moreover, I want to commend your team's excellent communication throughout the project. Regular progress updates and quick responses to our inquiries ensured that we remained informed and confident in the project's progress.

Once again, thank you to Calvin, Vani, and the teams for your outstanding services.

Ian had been exceptionally helpful and always making himself available to assist and guide us through the application and post application process. With his assistance, we had successfully achieved our outcomes and it had been of great pleasure working with Ian. Thank you!
